channel.title: CVE Feed for nikeo -- Customizr

item.title: CVE-2020-36755|2024-09-11T15:55:43.995Z -- nikeo -- customizr
item.description: The Customizr theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 4.3.0. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the czr_fn_post_fields_save() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to post fields via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
